articles.title: U.S. pipeline problems expose Canada's vulnerability to having the taps turned off - CBC.ca
articles.description: Problems with two major oil and gasoline pipelines in the U.S. underscore how fragile the North American energy infrastructure grid is and how vulnerable Canadians are to supply disruption.
articles.content: Problems with two major oil and gasoline pipelines in the United States underscore how fragile the North American energy infrastructure grid is and how vulnerable Canadians are to having their suppli… [+5527 chars]
